item.title: 受特朗普关税影响，日本暂停向美国运送部分包裹
item.description: 由于美国政府征收新的关税，日本邮政株式会社将暂停向美国运送一些小包裹，这表明美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的征税措施可能会对小型企业和个人产生影响。【原文：Japan Post Co. will suspend shipping of some small packages to the United States due to fresh tariffs imposed by the US government, in a sign of how President Donald Trump’s levies may impact smaller businesses and individuals.】

item.title: 最低限度豁免终止，台湾停止运送美国包裹
item.description: 在特朗普政府决定停止对低价值商品的 "微量 "关税豁免后，台湾邮政部门从周二起暂停投递运往美国的小包裹。【原文：Taiwan’s postal service has suspended deliveries of small parcels bound for the US, effective from Tuesday, following the Trump administration’s decision to halt the “de minimis” duty exemption for low-value goods.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行会议纪要显示未来宽松步伐将取决于数据
item.description: 澳大利亚中央银行董事会8月11-12日的会议记录显示，该董事会预计未来一年将进一步降低利率以实现其政策目标，而降息的步伐可能取决于经济数据。【原文：Australia’s central bank board expects to lower interest rates further over the coming year to meet its policy objectives, with the pace of decline likely to hinge on economic data, minutes of its Aug. 11-12 meeting showed.】

item.title: 供应担忧加剧，印度长债牛转为卖家
item.description: 印度最著名的多头债券看涨者之一已经削减了他的持仓，这反映了去年刚刚加倍持有债券后最近的情绪变化。【原文：One of India’s most prominent long-bond bulls has slashed his holdings, reflecting the recent change in sentiment after doubling down on the securities just last year.】

item.title: 尽管损失惨重，中国太阳能产业仍释放出希望信号
item.description: 中国太阳能制造商仍然亏损严重，但投资者开始发现他们在与产能过剩的斗争中取得进展的迹象。【原文：Chinese solar manufacturers are still heavily in the red, but investors are beginning to detect signs of progress in their battle against overcapacity.】

item.title: 香港 Gym Pure 获得 5000 多万美元用于削减大部分债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港金融精英经常光顾的连锁健身房 Pure 已获得新的融资承诺，以帮助其偿还债务。【原文：Pure, the Hong Kong gym chain frequented by the city’s financial elite, has secured commitments for new funding to help it pay down debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 李在镕访美后，现代汽车将在美投资增至 260 亿美元
item.description: 现代汽车集团将在 2028 年前把在美国的投资增加到 260 亿美元，以扩大汽车、钢铁和机器人的生产，这凸显了这家韩国企业集团与华盛顿不断加深的经济联系。【原文：Hyundai Motor Group will increase its investment in the US to $26 billion through 2028, as it seeks to expand autos, steel and robotics production, underscoring the South Korean conglomerate’s deepening economic ties with Washington.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯-奔驰养老金出售股份后日产股价下跌
item.description: 日产汽车公司股价下跌，此前有消息称梅赛德斯-奔驰养老金信托计划出售其在这家陷入困境的日本汽车制造商中的股票。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. shares fell after news the Mercedes-Benz Pension Trust plans to offload its stock in the troubled Japanese automaker.】

item.title: 特朗普寻求罢免美联储库克，美元随国债下跌
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统将美联储理事丽莎-库克赶下台后，美元兑所有主要货币走软，打击了人们对世界储备货币的信心。【原文：The dollar weakened against every major peer after President Donald Trump moved to oust Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook from her post, denting sentiment toward the world’s reserve currency.】

item.title: 亿万富翁穆尔西的家族办公室就初创企业估值提出警告
item.description: 科技界亿万富翁纳拉亚纳-穆尔蒂（Narayana Murthy）的家族办公室对印度初创企业的态度越来越谨慎，指出需要退出投资的基金推动了大幅折扣。【原文：The family office of tech billionaire Narayana Murthy is growing cautious on startups in India, pointing to steep discounts driven by funds that need to exit their investments.】

item.title: 美国团体要求华盛顿干预英中镍矿交易
item.description: 美国钢铁协会（American Iron and Steel Institute）要求白宫对巴西的一项价值 5 亿美元的交易进行干预，该交易可能使中国对全球镍储备拥有更大的控制权。【原文：The American Iron and Steel Institute has asked the White House to intervene in a $500 million deal in Brazil that could hand China greater control over global nickel reserves.】

item.title: 特朗普解除美联储理事库克职务后黄金上涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普采取行动立即解除美联储理事丽莎-库克的职务后，黄金上涨。【原文：Gold rose after US President Donald Trump moved to remove Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook with immediate effect.】

item.title: 特朗普解除美联储理事库克的职务，立即生效
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）被指控在抵押贷款申请中伪造文件后，采取行动解除了她在美国中央银行的职务。【原文：President Donald Trump moved to remove Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook from her post at the US central bank in the wake of allegations that she falsified documents on mortgage applications.】

item.title: 美国将对印度加征关税，石油供应成为焦点，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于美国准备对所有印度进口商品加倍征收关税，以惩罚印度购买俄罗斯原油，投资者在等待供应方面更明确的信号，石油在连续四天上涨后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after a four-day advance as investors waited for clearer signals on supplies, with the US poised to double a tariff on all Indian imports to penalize the country for buying Russian crude.】

item.title: 马来西亚财富继承人为私人市场寻求 2 亿美元资金
item.description: 由马来西亚财富继承人支持的投资公司 Iris Capital Partners 正在寻求从机构投资者那里筹集 2 亿美元，这是家族财富向外部资本开放的最新举措。【原文：Iris Capital Partners, an investment firm backed by the heir to a Malaysian fortune, is seeking to raise $200 million from institutional investors, the latest family wealth vehicle to open up to outside capital.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯称低中性利率时代 "似乎远未结束
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，鉴于压制利率的结构性因素并未消失，美国经济的中性利率可能与大流行病之前没有太大区别。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said the US economy’s neutral interest rate may not be much different than before the pandemic, given the structural factors that have kept a lid on rates haven’t gone away.】

item.title: 零售商成本增加，英国食品通胀加速
item.description: 由于恶劣天气和歉收加剧了超市运营成本上升所带来的压力，8 月份英国食品杂货价格略有上涨。【原文：UK grocery prices edged up in August, as bad weather and poor harvests exacerbated the strain of higher operating costs hitting supermarkets.】

item.title: 增税后英国年轻人面临科维德事件以来最糟糕的就业市场
item.description: 随着人工智能的兴起和就业成本的提高，就业机会被扭曲，正在寻找第一份工作的英国人面临着自科维德大流行以来最严重的招聘荒。【原文：Britons looking for their first jobs face the worst hiring drought since the depths of the Covid pandemic, as the rise in artificial intelligence and higher employment costs distort career opportunities.】

item.title: 印度股市难以摆脱关税前的悲观情绪
item.description: 由于与美国的贸易紧张局势几乎没有缓解的迹象，印度股市的表现可能会罕见地落后于新兴市场同行。【原文：Indian equities are likely to extend a rare underperformance to their emerging-market peers as trade tensions with the US show few signs of abating.】

item.title: 中国股市在流动性推动的反弹中发出警告信号
item.description: 在主要受流动性而非经济基本面改善推动的意外反弹之后，中国在岸股市正冒出红旗。【原文：Red flags are emerging in China’s onshore stocks, following a surprise rally mostly driven by liquidity rather than improved economic fundamentals.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 为收购 Verint 筹借 27 亿美元银行债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）正在主导一项约 27 亿美元的债务交易，以支持 Thoma Bravo 收购客户服务自动化企业 Verint Systems Inc.【原文：Banco Santander SA is leading a roughly $2.7 billion debt deal to support Thoma Bravo’s acquisition of customer-service automation business Verint Systems Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Interactive Brokers 加入 S&P 500 指数，取代沃尔格林
item.description: 零售交易平台 Interactive Brokers Group Inc. 将于本周晚些时候加入 S&P 500 指数，取代沃尔格林博姿联盟公司（Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc.【原文：Retail trading platform Interactive Brokers Group Inc. will be added to the S&P 500 index later this week, replacing Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. on the closely watched gauge of US stocks.】

item.title: 比索下滑，阿根廷关注回购贷款市场活动
item.description: 回购贷款是一种短期金融工具，在阿根廷银行流动性紧缩的情况下，利率屡创新高。【原文：Argentine authorities are stepping up scrutiny of investor activity in repo loans, the short-term financial instruments that have seen interest rates touch record highs amid a liquidity crunch at the nation’s banks.】

item.title: 由于铁矿石需求下降，Fortescue 公司利润暴跌 41
item.description: Fortescue Ltd. 的全年利润因铁矿石价格下跌而下降了 41%，原因是中国在长期的房地产放缓和钢铁供过于求的情况下，对铁矿石的需求趋于平缓。【原文：Fortescue Ltd.’s full-year profit fell 41% on lower prices for its iron ore, as demand from China plateaus amid its protracted property slowdown and an oversupply of steel.】

item.title: 通胀风险引发美联储减息，亚洲股市将下滑：市场综述
item.description: 由于投资者担心即将公布的一份关键的美国通胀报告可能会破坏美联储的降息步伐，亚洲股市周二似乎将跟随华尔街走低。【原文：Asian equities looked set to follow Wall Street lower Tuesday as investors were on edge that a looming key US inflation report may derail the pace of Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 首席执行官称，日本小型芯片设备制造商被排除在英伟达繁荣之外
item.description: 日本全国的物价都在上涨，但芯片制造设备部件的价格却没有上涨。东京电子有限公司（Tokyo Electron Ltd. ）的供应商丸前株式会社（Marumae Co.【原文：Prices are rising across Japan, but not for the components of chipmaking gear. Tokyo Electron Ltd. supplier Marumae Co. is seeking out deals to change that.】

item.title: Interactive Brokers 因取代沃尔格林进入 S&P 500 指数而上涨
item.description: (更新后的股票走势，增加了 Talen Energy）。【原文：(Updates for postmarket share move, adds Talen Energy.)】

item.title: 韩国消费者信心指数在出炉前升至七年新高
item.description: 由于股价飙升和出口恢复性增长抵消了围绕美国关税的不确定性，韩国消费者信心升至七年来的最高点，这为央行本周保持政策稳定提供了更多动力。【原文：South Korea’s consumer confidence rose to the highest in seven years as surging stock prices and resilient exports offset uncertainties surrounding US tariffs, giving the central bank added incentive to hold policy steady this week.】

item.title: iPhone 改头换面：苹果公司推出全新 Air 机型，并计划于 2026 年推出首款可折叠 iPhone。
item.description:
经过多年的最小化重新设计，苹果迎来了一个新时代。【原文：

Tras años de rediseños mínimos, Apple inicia una nueva era.

】

item.title: 安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）斥资 1 亿美元参与制定人工智能法规
item.description: 风险投资公司安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）正与硅谷其他主要投资者一道，支持一个价值 1 亿美元的新政治网络，该网络旨在影响美国的人工智能政策，从而加深了科技行业在唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下对政治的参与。【原文：Venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz is joining other major Silicon Valley investors in backing a new $100 million political network that seeks to influence US artificial intelligence policy, deepening the tech industry’s involvement in politics under President Donald Trump.】
